title.narrative: India: Second National Tuberculosis Control Project

description.narrative: (i) to achieve the global targets of 70% case detection and 85% cure rate in 100% of the districts; and (ii) for the zones where DOTS has been under implementation for five or more years, the incidence of smear-positive TB starts to decline.

condition.narrative: The Borrower shall cause MOHFW to maintain throughout the period of Project implementation, in form and with functions, staffingand resources satisfactory to the Association
The GOI shall cause the MOHFW to implement the GAAP in a manner satisfactory to IDA
The GOI shall cause the MOHFW to maintain the Empowered Procurement Wing, in a manner satisfactory to IDA
